title: Encumbering Stone
summaries: The Encumbering Stone is a pre-Hardmode tool that prevents item pickup while inside the character's inventory.

While in the inventory, the Encumbering Stone will prevent the pickup of any items, even if the player already has a stackable item in their inventory. This can be very useful while farming events or mining out <linked>hellevators</linked>. The Encumbering Stone will also prevent the entry of items into <linked>Void Bags</linked>.

Items reeled in from <linked>fishing</linked> are still placed in the player's inventory. <linked>Hearts</linked> and <linked>Stars</linked> will also be picked up even with the Encumbering Stone in the inventory.

Pressing âš· Open / Activate on the Encumbering Stone in the player's inventory will toggle it between Encumbering Stone and Uncumbering Stone. Toggling it to the Uncumbering Stone disables its functions, allowing the player to pick up items again.
The Encumbering Stone has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being found in Sandstone Chests in the Underground Desert.
